amendment.description: To clarify that nothing in the resolution shall be construed as a declaration of war or authorization to use force.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3554 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3554 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Paul.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3554 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3554 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Paul.
